title: LC Property Template Schema (by Sinopia)
description: Property template for property associated with the entity described by a resource template.

mandatory.title: Mandatory
mandatory.description: Indication that the property is mandatory.

propertyLabel.title: Resource Label
propertyLabel.description: Preferred, human readable label associated with the property.

propertyURI.title: Resource URI
propertyURI.description: URI of the RDF property being described.

remark.title: Remark
remark.description: Comment or guiding statement intended to be presented as supplementary information in user display.

repeatable.title: Repeatable
repeatable.description: Indication that the property is repeatable.

resourceTemplates.title: Always empty array of Resource Template References

type.title: Type
type.description: Type of value (literal / resource / lookup / target) that is allowed by this property.

valueLanguage.title: literal value language
valueLanguage.description: Language specified for a literal.  Never used/ignored?

remark.title: dataType remark
remark.description: Comment or guiding statement intended to be presented as supplementary information in user display.  Ignored.

editable.title: Editable
editable.description: Whether the value provided for the property is meant to be modified by a cataloger.

repeatable.title: Repeatable
repeatable.description: Indication whether the valueConstraint(?) is repeatable. (confusing)

validatePattern.title: validation pattern
validatePattern.description: Regular expression for input validation.  Never used/ignored.

valueTemplateRefs.title: Array of Resource Template References
valueTemplateRefs.description: Array of identifiers (eventually URIs) for Resource Templates.

useValuesFrom.title: Use Values From (these URIs)
useValuesFrom.description: Array of Authority URIs or Vocabulary Lookup API identifiers to perform a lookup against.

valueDataType.title: Value Data Types
valueDataType.description: Data Type information - Type URI and comments primarily.

dataTypeURI.title: Data Type URI
dataTypeURI.description: URI for the Data Type of the Lookup Value in this value template.

dataTypeLabel.title: dataType Label
dataTypeLabel.description: Preferred, human readable label associated with the DataType.  Ignored.

dataTypeLabelHint.title: dataType LabelHint
dataTypeLabelHint.description: Short, human readable label for display purposes.  Ignored.

remark.title: dataType remark
remark.description: Comment or guiding statement intended to be presented as supplementary information in user display.  Ignored.

defaults.title: array of default values
defaults.description: array of default values each comprised of default literal and URI

items.title: default Literal + URI
items.description: a default value is specified with a literal and a URI
